content.text: Let’s use some more shapes to make a picture! Circle works the same way as square - a size, starting location and on/off. Type light.circle(12, E8, on)
There’s a triangle too! Type light.triangle(F8, H5, H11, off) to make Pacman’s mouth. The three coordinates are the corners of the triangle!
Press MAKE to see your finished Pacman!
